casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Richard BRAY. No. 563P97-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jerry Wilson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of December 2008 by Pro Se for Request to Reconsider Motions for Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
